sentences.english: Serve the citizens in order of priority and urgency on practical affair, take the easiest the first .
sentences.chinese: 我们为市民办实事要分轻重缓急，先易后难。

sentences.english: Tan pointed out that the government had established priorities.
sentences.chinese: 谭富卞指出政府已定下了轻重缓急。

sentences.english: Understand the urgency of the situation.
This person should be able to easily answer the questions on setting priorities.
sentences.chinese: 应聘人应该能轻松的回答有关决定轻重缓急的问题。

sentences.english: It was a matter of balancing priorities.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个权衡轻重缓急的问题。

sentences.english: Learnd to set priorities and make decisions.
sentences.chinese: 学会分清轻重缓急和做决定。
